header.rec_loc: In ANON's Aunt's house in Dorset
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Houses, locations, cats, decor, smoking, computers, birthdays, pets, entertainment, sending messages, touch phones, going out, tea, cooking equipment, animals, seating arrangements, decorating, jobs, tuition, bachelor's degrees, university, care homes,
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, anecdote telling, making arrangements
